name: Reliance Aqua-Pak 20L
description: Fewer trips to the tap, more time to explore the campground. With 20L capacity, the Aqua-Pak is a great solution for a basecamp.Translucent body lets you keep an eye on your water level.Hide-away spout and vent allow for precise, glug-free pours.Textured lid provides solid grip with wet or dry hands.Large handle makes transport easier.
